pkgmetadata.longdescription: Balancing Centrifuge Rotors // Find the numbers of tubes that can be loaded in centrifuge rotors and give the instructions on how to balance these tubes in cases of equal or unequal masses. The methods of the package are constructed based on Sivek (2010) doi:10.1515/integ.2010.031 and Peil and Hauryliuk (2010) arXiv:1004.3671.
